content.label: Played this when it first came out and it was highly enjoyable. Now 4 years later I downloaded it again and let my 7yo son play and he‚Äôs enjoying it very much so. Thanks developer!

I finished the game a year ago but decided to go back here for a review since Love You To Bits deserves it! 
The game is brilliantly designed and written, i got so excited in every new levels as it changes in term of set design, concept, colour. The obstacles are vary and is soooo fun to solve
The story and the characters themselves as well the music come together so well, I have nothing to complain about the plot it has, the game is just stunning and reflect a fantastic result of the team! 

I am looking forward to see more developments and new games from you! The best puzzle game ever!

title.label: Best game ever! With one main disappointment

content.label: Last week I was randomly reminded of tiny thief, a game that use to be my absolute favorite game of all time. I quickly realized it was off the App Store and thought that this one looked similar but had low expectations. Tgod I was wrong! This game is super cute and fun and perfectly challenging. The ending was horrid though and I actually can‚Äôt believe they would end it with such an easy and short level. I would pay another $4 for a much more challenging and fun last level BUT that part aside it‚Äôs a great game and def worth the money!

Love you to bits is one of the best mobile games I‚Äôve ever played. I love how all the levels have there own little story and interesting characters. It reminds me of tiny thief which was my favorite mobile game until it was removed from the App Store. Personally I think tiny thief was a better game but that might just be nostalgia talking.

title.label: Oooooooof in a great way and I mean a great way!

content.label: BEST GAME EVER,I mean BEST APP I‚ÄôVE EVER PLAYED!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!üòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçü§©ü§©ü§©ü§©ü§©ü§©ü§©ü§©ü§©ü§©ü§©ü§©üëçüèøüëçüèøüëçüèøüëçüèøüëçüèøüëçüèøüëçüèøüëçüèøüëçüèøüëçüèøüëçüèøüëçüèø
I was so sad whenever tiny thief was lost but this game fills that empty void in my heart thank youüòåüòåüòåüòå

I played this with my kids (3 and 5) and it was fun for all of us. I love the music so I don‚Äôt mind listening while they play it over and over again too. It‚Äôs funny, scary, touching, and very clever.
Seriously on of the best and most charming games I have ever played.

I can‚Äôt believe I just found out about this game!! I‚Äôm a huge gamer, from triple A games to indie games like Sally Face, Fran Bow, Machinarium, etc. Somehow this one slid right past me and now I‚Äôm telling everyone about it. I‚Äôm not sure I can really compare this game to anything, it kind of made me feel the way To The Moon did? Just be ready to break out the tissue box!! Also mega kudos to the devs for not making this a gacha game in any way. You will never see another $ sign after u pay for it and there is about 30 ish levels I believe? And each level takes me up to about 15 min. Basically what I‚Äôm saying is this is a complete game for a mere $4 with almost the same quality as all the other games I listed above. I highly recommend this game to anyone who likes indie, story, puzzle, point and click, or adventure games. I did read some critical reviews that the story was thin and shallow and that there weren‚Äôt any puzzles involved. I mean it‚Äôs true there is no dialogue and it‚Äôs only ‚Äúmemory‚Äù videos aside from the gameplay, but it‚Äôs still an amazing game. No it‚Äôs not Life is Strange but it‚Äôs still perfection in its own way. Also there is a lot of clicking but it‚Äôs a point in click lol, saw that complaint too. What did you expect? You can play mindlessly and just walk around clicking until you get it correct, or you can think about it logically and B line to the correct location to do the puzzle. No this game won‚Äôt challenge you like The Witness but it def still has a problem solving aspects. Anyway, if you go into it without comparing it or with a negative attitude, and just accept the game for what it is, you‚Äôre going to have a good time :)

I have been wanting to play Tiny Thief or at least something close to it for a long time, and I finally found it. The game is basically Tiny Thief in space while also having a compelling plot. Not saying that Tiny Thief‚Äôs plot was bad, in fact it was really good. This one is just good in a different way. The levels are well made, the music is perfect, especially the main title‚Äôs theme, the story is great... it is truly fantastic.
this game is so beautifully made and the story line made me cry I love it so much
Hope they‚Äôll make more games like this!

title.label: I love this game but that 1% hit me a bit

content.label:
I finished the game and I loved it! It‚Äôs so cute and pure and when you rescue her she sits with him at the end love and it‚Äôs so cute! ü•∞üòçü•∞üòç. The places he had to go through were pretty and very detailed, the thing that I loved is that the boy still had his love for her ü•∞ü•∞ü•∞. But that 1%. That 1%. That 1% was how hard it was to find the memories. The memories were easy at the beginning but then started to get harder, I really wanted to watch all of it so I don‚Äôt need to watch any videos. And also, in that 1% was how slow he walked, I kinda wanted him to walk a bit faster or run, but overall, IT WAS AMAZING! You don‚Äôt need to fix it because this is my opinion but if you did, then thank you! I will be downloading this again but I don‚Äôt have enough room to download this amazing game but I promise, I WILL BUT IT AGAINü§óü§óü§óü§ó
That‚Äôs all!
Ps: please make more games like this!

title.label: The most moving game in the app store

content.label: Far and away one of my favorite games of all time. Beyond the crafted interface and stunning art, its storytelling is something I've never experienced before, and it moves your emotions everytime you watch one of the memories. The word "game" almost feels like an insult to this masterpiece, but I love this game, and I love the creators.
This is a very good game but I am stuck on the scary level

title.label: One of my favorite apps ever!

content.label: Love You To Bits is fantastic! I love that you truly get to explore fun, unique places in this game. I think it‚Äôs nice having a game where you can explore and figure things out without having to re-start or worry about time constraints, villains chasing you, etc. It‚Äôs so low-key while still providing a challenge, which is so much more fun and much less stressful. I wish there were more games like this!
I am so sad it‚Äôs over! This game was so beautiful,I can‚Äôt stop watching the ending!
I loved every part of this game! It was so fun and challenging at the same time!üòÅ
It‚Äôs worth the money, there are so many levels and it‚Äôs such a nice story. I cried at the end! üò≠üò≠ The musics is perfect for the story and it‚Äôs very calming.

Love you to bits is so good! I am addicted to the game. The plot is really sad and some of the levels are easy and TOO HARD for me! I am 8 and 3/4  and it is still too hard for me! Maybe you should make hints or hint movies in the game like Mario but the game is still awesome!

One of the finest games on iOS.  Ignore the whiny reviewers who gave this a low rating.  For how cheap this game is there is an amazing amount of content - none of which is filler.  This game and it‚Äôs developer deserve your time and money.

To the development team - you‚Äôve done an outstanding job in creating this absolute gem.  üòÅüëç

title.label: Why doesn't this game save your place when you exit?

content.label: The game is solid, but I'm giving it one star so that the developers can read this review. It is a huge pain in the butt to have to restart the level over just because you closed the app for 30 minutes. No excuses for this.

Best game Ive ever played. So much detail in the game. So much fun!! Every level is different and sure unique. My favorite is the hotel and the arcade!

I just finished the game and, lemme tell you, it was the best game I have played in a long time!I had so much fund with it and I still have a few memories to grab which means I‚Äôm not over yet.

Though, the ending was bittersweet
The bitter was that the best game is over! And how how nova did react to kosmo hugging her which led me to theorize, although that could just be me, cuz I don‚Äôt want this to end!

The sweet was how Kosmo finally after all that hustle,was able to embrace his love again and (I hope) live a happily ever after with his true love.

Now, to explain the title.This is a demand, but, please make some type of sequel or prequel or anything just involving the same characters,(somewhat of) the same plot that would truly make my day, month or even year, it‚Äôll keep me very happy for lot more than just a hot second if there was more.

title.label: great puzzle click n play game

content.label:
i would give this 5 stars except‚Äîyou can‚Äôt save your progress within a level, leave the game and you have to start over.
otherwise, i really enjoy this game

This game is is full of beautiful features and small touches that make it what it is, a masterpiece. It tells a sweet story of a star-cross relationship. At the beginning, you see where Nova is blown apart by a attack and you play as Kosmo and have to find each part of her in different crazy, cute, and creative worlds and put her back together! You even have bonus items to find that brings back memories that u can watch. The music is beautiful and every world is different. You have to use ur mind in every level because no level is made the same. This game will rip your heart out and put to back together from it‚Äôs beautiful art and touching story lines. This game is a must get if you love puzzles or just want to pass time and enjoy every minute of it!

title.label: Put Tiny Thief Back On The App Store!!!

content.label: Yeah sure this game is really great. but tiny their was my childhood. i would actually pay again to be able to play it. PLEASE! That game was a classic. i would do anything to be able to play that game again! :(

Honestly the best game I have played. I just want more of them!

The puzzles are just challenging enough to make it fun rather than boring or frustrating and you can really tell that the creators took a lot of time into each level. I also love my ability to play around with each outcome even if I am finished with the puzzle. Keep working on amazing games!

bring back tiny thief

I love this game, it‚Äôs the best puzzle game on the App Store. The graphics are cute, and the game is challenging but not super complicated. I like the concept, and it‚Äôs an amazing way to test your brain and pass time... game reminds me of limbo.

title.label: The Best Game I‚Äôve ever downloaded

content.label: If you‚Äôre a huge fan of point and click games as well as puzzles, this is the perfect game for you. With a simple yet engaging story and collectibles that serve as a background to care for the characters in honestly hooked. But what really has sold me is the innovative designs for each level and the thought into it, even down to titles of levels and how they are played through. Probably my favorite game I‚Äôve downloaded
Love this game but I want tiny thief back too. We spent money on it. Give our money back or put it back up!!!!
I love adventure games, and this game has by far, surpassed my expectations. Omg! It was hard, but fun and I loved every second of it. More levels please!!!

title.label: One of the best mobile games

content.label: I am 8 and I loved this game. Some parts were hard but you can get through them pretty easily. The idea of the game is pretty cool. My dad said it was okay for me to write this review. We played parts of it together.

This game is annoying and frustrating. I just completed it. There are challenges , only one or two puzzles, and all you have to do is find which items to click. Everything is about what to ‚Äúclick‚Äù. I‚Äôm not so sure how or why this game has so many stars and why we have to pay for it. Games like Limbo put this app to shame. Don‚Äôt waste your energy, money and frustration on this app.

title.label: Cute game but has some issues

content.label: This is a great game! It took my a little while to beat. The levels are all different and creative. The only issue I had was that whenever you are in the middle of a level and want to exit out and continue later, you can‚Äôt... whenever i quit out of a level it restarted the whole level and I lost my progress..
